workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Advanced Features

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create Datasource Connections
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create datasource connections.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Groups and Compare Pairs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create groups and compare pairs.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Configure Delta Comparison
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Delta Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Configure Auto Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Automatic Row Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Configure Database Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Database Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
